metadata.Title: CVE-2022-37047 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The component tcprewrite in Tcpreplay v4.4.1 was discovered to contain a heap-based buffer overflow in get_ipv6_next at common/get.c:713. NOTE: this is different from CVE-2022-27940.

criterions.comment: tcpreplay: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
